configuration:
dfs.datanode.use.datanode.hostnamefalse dfs.client.use.datanode.hostnamefalse dfs.datanode.data.dirfile:///dfs/data DataNode directory
{{- if .Values.global.namenodeHAEnabled }}
dfs.nameservices altiplano-hdfs
dfs.ha.namenodes.altiplano-hdfs nn0,nn1
dfs.namenode.rpc-address.altiplano-hdfs.nn0 {{ template "namenode-svc-0" . }}:8020
dfs.namenode.rpc-address.altiplano-hdfs.nn1 {{ template "namenode-svc-1" . }}:8020
dfs.namenode.http-address.altiplano-hdfs.nn0 {{ template "namenode-svc-0" . }}:9870
dfs.namenode.http-address.altiplano-hdfs.nn1 {{ template "namenode-svc-1" . }}:9870
dfs.namenode.shared.edits.dir qjournal://{{ template "journalnode-quorum" . }}/altiplano-hdfs
dfs.ha.automatic-failover.enabled true
dfs.ha.fencing.methods shell(/bin/true)
dfs.journalnode.edits.dir /dfs/journal
dfs.client.failover.proxy.provider.altiplano-hdfs org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.ha.ConfiguredFailoverProxyProvider
{{- end }}
dfs.namenode.name.dir file:///dfs/name NameNode directory for namespace and transaction logs storage.
dfs.datanode.http.address 0.0.0.0:50075
dfs.namenode.datanode.registration.ip-hostname-check false
dfs.namenode.rpc-bind-host 0.0.0.0
dfs.namenode.servicerpc-bind-host 0.0.0.0
{{- range $key, $value := index .Values.conf "hdfsSite" }} {{ $key }}{{ $value }} {{- end }}
